entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #258

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24897: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #260

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator is comparing configuration keys case-sensitively #88112
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not properly handle lifetimes for return values and 'out' parameters in failing COM methods #88111
  • Avoid emitting code that honors BinderOptions when not specified in binding call #88110
    8.0.0
  • Native crash on System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Tests net8.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_release #88102
  • [RISC-V] Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 #88099
    8.0.0
  • S.R.I.Wasm.PackedSimd API changes #88092
    8.0.0
  • Program throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Release #88091
    8.0.0
  • Define and implement behavior of NativeAOT EventPipe IPC if there's already another runtime in the process #88087
  • JIT: Support FIELD_LIST stack args on more platforms #88086
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #88098
  • [browser][MT] The WebSocket is not connected. #88084
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in tracing infrastructure when build is running ILC while ETW is enabled #88081
    8.0.0
  • Use Initial Executable optimization within native runtime #88076
    Future

Closed

  • Regressions in Math.Min/Max benchmarks #88096
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken with build errors #88108
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #56592
    8.0.0
  • mac m1 using System.Data.Odbc on .net 7 (core) #88007
  • JIT does not promote Span<T> in R2R code #85511
    8.0.0
  • CORINFO_FLG_CUSTOMLAYOUT semantics #71711
    8.0.0
  • TarEntry: link target path checks #78695
  • .NET framework 4.8.1 TLS 1.3 incompatible with .NET 6 TLS 1.3, presumably other versions #87975
    Future
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector and System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #80566
    8.0.0
  • Frozen Collection Follow-up: Items/Keys/Values properties #86719
    8.0.0
  • Cannot create a CancellationTokenSource with an infinite delay with TimeProvider that is not TimeProvider.System #88000
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WhenAny<TResult>(IEnumerable) inconsistently does not use current scheduler for tasks #87481
  • hi, quesion about coreclr interpreter #88078
  • [iOS] Vector128 and Vector64 GetOne* test failures #87412
    8.0.0
  • [Dotnet 6.0] Timeout error always says "The request was canceled due to the configured HttpClient.Timeout of 100 seconds elapsing", even when timeout is different from 100sec #88074

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NativeAOT rethrow bug #88113
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion from 6.2.2 to 6.2.4 #88107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Reenable GCStress WeakReferenceTest #88103
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Remove Vector<T> fallbacks #88101
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Enable physical promotion by default #88090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling recursion over fields #88083
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [IGNORE] [mono] Add support for SSE1 in JIT mode. #88075
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Ensure that we can still inline Math.Max and Math.Min on downlevel hardware #88106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ABIStress test hashing padding #88097
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Automatically instrument jiterpreter traces if td->verbose_level > 0 #88053
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [browser][mt] active issues in smoke test #88100
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Disable building of tests with build breaks #88094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add some JIT helper functions to throw common corlib exceptions. #87044
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] The REG_SCRATCH is not conflict with REG_PINVOKE_FRAME. #88029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Fix a couple of replay bugs #88088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix TimeProvider Timer with Infinity Timeout #88024
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Fix native bits build when targeting "cross" architecture iOS platforms #88079
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2210267 #88069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Optimize aggregate info iteration in physical promotion #87997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Use compGetTieringName for disassembly output #88033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Ensure runtime thread for diagnostic server thread #88077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • minor regex cleanup #88026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Updated

  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    blocked, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Workaround for __clear_cache() #88039
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #88004
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    area-Infrastructure
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Convert Volatile to JIT intrinsics #88073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #88043
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Eliminate gratituous allocations from the LLVM object writer #2319

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to june 23 #2318
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: switch WASI target to wasm32-wasi #2317

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The URL for downloading the .NET runtime when starting a fx-dependent app is incorrect #33435
  • AOT compiling/publishing from Visual Studio post build event create endless loop of dotnet calls #32512
  • NETSDK1206 should not be flagging 'browser' RID platform #33579
    .NET 8.0
  • dotnet pack fails using UseArtifactsOutput=true with multi-targeting and global usings #32675

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • First run experience always runs with `sudo` #32619
    Discussion
  • dotnet new globaljson should have allowPrerelease option #32500
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • Cannot build/restore maccatalyst targeting .net6 due to missing package #33530
    Discussion
  • Test project on Mac complain about not having windows target (NETSDK1136) #32480
    Discussion
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686
  • dotnet store fails because of content files (Microsoft.NET.ComposeStore.targets(345,5): error MSB3024) #32942
    Discussion
  • Windows runtimes are showing in Linux SDK tarball #33472
  • Secrets Management in different Environments #33241
    Backlog
  • Regression - ctrl-c handling commit from old dotnet/cli repo not merged into this repo #33417
    Discussion
  • Installing maui-ios Workload on Mac Fails #33631
  • NETSDK1206 error when building the aspnetcore repo with latest 8.0 Preview 6 SDK build #33486
  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993
  • Provide a way to turn off Diagnostic Tracing in projects #11530
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33635
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix printed version for APICompat.Tool and GenAPI.Tool #33619
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Update .gitignore to ignore .env files #33305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set XLF files to be collapsed by default in PR reviews #33511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33621
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33584
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #33572
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2210554 #33590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers release notes #33537
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Move wait and result calls to the thread pool to avoid deadlocks. #33586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update collection-literals.md #7301

Merged

  • Move file #7300
  • Rename CL-2023-06-16.md to CL-2023-06-26.md #7299

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lang svc auto-completes `partial Foo` with `unsafe` modifier in a disallowed position #68805
  • WorkspacePullDiagnosticHandler should handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68797
  • `ERR_AmbiguousPrimaryConstructorParameterAsColorColorReceiver` logic doesn't find generic extension methods #68796
    17.7

Closed

  • Regression: SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload always throws #68761
    Next
  • LSP pull diagnostic handlers should handle None/Disabled option value for compiler and analyzer background analysis options #68798
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33826.293 #68794

PullRequests

Created

  • Include expected custom modifiers for `in` parameters of virtual operators. #68808
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Force public APIs to return complete results #68804
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not emit empty language property in SARIF log #68801
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Collection literals: use NoneOperation #68795
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals: address comments #68793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection expressions vs conditional access expressions #68756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • remove long gone owners #68755
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update VSTelemetry package version #68806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Roslyn side changes to enable full solution background analysis in LSP/VSCode #68799
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • More workarounds for VS Code project system issues #68792
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fixes SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload which always throws - #68761 #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Retain semicolon during updates of IndexerDeclaration #68768
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzers #68655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpLogger does not log RequestBody #49063
  • HTTPS certificate exact match using Issuer's SimpleName instead of Certificate's #49062
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #49060
  • TryParseExact not working properly for TimeSpan and custom format not working for "\" in DateTime and DateTimeOffset #49059
  • Unable to install 6.0.18 or 6.0.19 on Server 2016 #49058
  • Default WebAssembly loading progress indicator doesn't apply in Blazor Web template #49056
  • [Blazor] Remove `suppress-error` from script #49053
    8.0-preview7
  • Add-Migration throwing execption #49051
  • [Blazor]StateHasChanged does not reflect immediately #49048
  • Multiple API template entry points should be reconciled #49047
  • Quarantine HubConnectionTest.sendsCloseMessageOnStop() #49043

Closed

  • [Question] How to find problem in our code leading to concurrent usage of HttpContext ? #47900
  • Perf regression: fortunes #49049
  • Blazor Inheritance Not Working #49008
  • Parameter itself is passed into exception message instead of its name #48853
    Backlog
  • Is it just me or... #49002
  • Clean up naming and layout for the new Blazor weather page #48706
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: plaintext #49037
  • Debug the ASP.NET Core API project with IIS Express profile, the web page keeps loading. #48774
  • Issue with Parameter Transformers in combination with Area Routing in ASP.NET Core MVC #49041

PullRequests

Created

  • Callsite rendermodes (#48967) #49055
    area-blazor
  • Disable sendsCloseMessageOnStop() Java SignalR test #49044
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Pass in parameter name #49052
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview7
  • Make sure rented array is always returned #49042
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Clean up naming and layout for the new Blazor weather page #48940
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d60cf22` to `b239fb5` #48987
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2209591 #48970
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Update IExceptionHandler.cs #49040
    area-middleware, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, .NET 8.0
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure
  • Reduce RendererSynchronizationContext overheads #48720
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-dump threadpool and threadpoolqueue clarification #4003
    8.0.0
  • Q: How to use / install dotnet-dump where the dotnet runtime is not installed globally #4006
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • ProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #3985

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry/Editor with SemanticProperties.Description stills hows TalkBack Actions #15888
  • Entry not working when keyboard is numeric and os language is not english (net8-pre5) #15884
    .NET 8
  • System fonts such as ".SFUI-Semibold" are not applied on iOS #15882
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage: Detail page is not fitting the screen on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15877
  • FlyoutPage: Scrolling is not working in the Detail page on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15876
  • Title blinks when closing the page #15875
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Webview crash the Application Android #15874
  • [MAUI][Regression] The recipe details page is not fully displayed #15872
  • [iOS, MAC] Image not loading from stream or URI binding source #15871
  • [Android] Grid with columns is not measured correctly. #15870
    Backlog

Closed

  • WinUI: Pushing the same page instance onto a NavigationPage after popping it causes a crash. #7698
    .NET 8
  • Frame does not support BorderWidth #15851
  • WebAuthenticator does not extract parameters contained in a fragment (regression) #15661
  • Remove usages of `BackQueue` from `StackNavigationManager` #5613
    Backlog
  • Border Left and Right Margins Dont work on iOS, works well on Android #13965
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Label in Scrollview doesn't show on iOS #7933
  • Xaml compiler removes xaml-only Resources from Release builds #12659
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Black screen on launch #14408
  • Cannot debug on iOS as `Loaded Assembly xxxxx` phase takes too long. #14822
  • Shell crashes upon adding/removing items #9938
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Wait for switched item to load #15891
  • [net8.0] Update aspnet packages #15887
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Revert] Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItems… #15886
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix WinUI test issues #15885
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • [X] Connect event to internal handler #15881
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] avoid AmibuousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>
  • Added size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.2 to 17.6.3 #15878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature request: reload entity with all dependencies #31149
  • Azure Active Directory Default Connection Speed #31147
  • Will EFCcore support sharding and table sharding in the future? Similar to Java's ShardingSphere #31145

Closed

  • Update pattern for scaffolding column default constraints #13613
    8.0.0-preview7
  • EF Core generate SQL request which always return empty result. #31129
  • Binary breaking changes in `NavigationEntry` in EF Core 8.0 #31104
    8.0.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Json reader final maybe #31150

Merged

  • No longer scaffold nullable booleans when column has a default value #31148
    providers-beware
  • Revert binary breaking change in Load/LoadAsync methods #31141
  • Add complex types to Metadata #31003

Updated

  • Add readme for EFcore.Desgin NuGet package #30471
  • Parse default value literals for SQLite #31127
